feed.title: This thread is not about the soft/hard fork technical debate

entry.title: This thread is not about the soft/hard fork technical debate
entry.summary: The conversation between Gregory Maxwell and Sergio Demian Lerner is being analyzed. Gregory is complimented on his language skills and his ability to write eloquent words. A specific dialogue is mentioned where Gregory's response is compared to Sergio's statement, highlighting that Gregory's version is more polarizing and changes the intent quite dramatically. It is suggested that Gregory shouldn't attack Mike and instead focus on discussing the topic at hand.
